room_title: Escape room "The Library" by The Panel Room Escape Games in St. Joseph (MO)
review: The Library was a wonderful mix of various elements. Digital and classic methods of puzzle solving meshed flawlessly with a story that was both lighthearted and interesting. One felt a real sense of accomplishment and pride with each successive solve. I look forward to future rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Library" by The Panel Room Escape Games in St. Joseph (MO)
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our experience escaping from "The Library". Can't wait to come back and try another room!
